title: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account

tosdr.case: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use state that the licenses you grant to Course Hero for your submissions are "royalty-free (except for any payments or credits we expressly agree to pay to you when you make your Submission), perpetual, transferable, sublicensable, irrevocable, and worldwide." Here, "irrevocable" means they can still use it.
